name: M.C.E
description:
M.C.E aka Moto-Visual coordination Enhancer is a Game made to increase your hand eye reflexes and train you eyes.

Features:

  1. Increases basic hand reflex
  2. Increases the number of things your eye might spot at once
  3. is a Fun game to play with your friends
  4. It's been made in less than 20h(THAT's a feature! XD)

Once the Game is Done I'd like you to post your Scores untill i Implement a high score system! :D The Highest Score will get a Game of Ours for Free each month.

So as you see the game is released now. I have no Idea if it's actually worth ANYTHING but sure it's here! :D. I'll be working on releasing this game on WebGL once i get a host ready
